fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: During the day, you may send an anonymous love letter to any player. If they accept, you join their faction, and they are roleblocked for as long as you live.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You are roleblock immune.
The text that the other player receives is "The **Nice Guy** (5296) has sent you a love letter." If they do not respond, this is counted as rejecting the love letter.
You will learn at the end of the night if the player you selected accepted your love letter.
